title: Adam Smith and The Wealth of Nations
creator_credit: John Haggarty, Jean Wadlow, Liberty Fund and Charles Barker Films
brief_description: Studies the life and works of Adam Smith, the Scottish political economist and philosopher whose book “The Wealth of Nations” was completed two hundred years ago. Outlines many of Smith’s most interesting and controversial theories.
